nodes.text: The NX-14 Needler was a type of needler designed to penetrate personal energy shields by firing a sharp, ferroceramic darts. The dart could also be laced with contact poison, delivering the poison to its targets.

Debuted by Golan Arms during the rise of the Galactic Empire, the NX-14 was one of the smallest, most compact needler produced by the company. Palm-sized, the weapon was made of an inert, light-absorbing fibermesh polycarbonate. Its internals were shielded which aided the weapon in being easily concealable and nearly impossible to find when hidden.
